description: A specific type of AAC audio compression widely adopted for use as the audio stream on small mobile devices.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Formal name: ISO/IEC 14496-3:2001. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 3: Audio. (This part of the MPEG-4 standard specifies several types of audio coding including various Advanced Audio Coding objects.) Common name: AAC-LC.
